# hasAlarms

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has alarms.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasAlarms: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the calendar item has alarms; otherwise it does not.

## Adding and Removing Alarms

- **addAlarm(_:)**: Adds an alarm to the receiver.
- **removeAlarm(_:)**: Removes an alarm from the calendar item.
- **alarms**: The alarms associated with the calendar item, as an array of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm] objects.
